array.string: Please indicate whether you’d permit using Location Services.
Location Services is blocked on your device.
You have refused this app’s use of Location Services. Please open the Settings app and select Privacy > Location Services.
This app will track your location even when it isn’t running. This is important so we can collect information about your activity.
This app will track your location only when it is in use. This will make it more difficult to measure your activity for the study.

dict.string:
This test asks you to walk as far as you can for $MIN$ minutes.
Tap the “Proceed” button when you are ready to begin.

This test, testing how far you can walk for $MIN$ minutes, is not available.
Either the necessary sensors are not available, or you have not permitted this app to use them
Step Test 2 mini report for subject %subjectID% at %currentDate%
You decided not to send the report.
Your report will be available in the Drafts folder of your email account, in the Mail app. Ask your caregiver for help in sending it.
It was not possible to schedule your report for delivery.
